name: Eclipse Tower
description:
A puzzle game.

Control with arrows or W, A, S, D.

Try to reach the portals simultaneously.

Press ESC to quit the game.

Team:

Pedro Braga - Desenvolvedor

 Anderson Kroeff - Sound Design 

Mateus Namur- Sound Design 

Luis Felipe Souza Santos - Sound Design
